# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Only the latest version of `goubus` is supported for security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| latest  | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of `goubus` seriously. If you believe you've found a security vulnerability, please do **not** open a public issue. 

Instead, please report it to the maintainer via email at [bytenet@honeybbq.dev](mailto:bytenet@honeybbq.dev).

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and provide a timeline for a fix if the vulnerability is confirmed.
